MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnCompilerError(class Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaError error) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:Microsoft.Vsa.IVsaError> object representing the offending error.
Docs.summary: Notifies the host about how to respond to compiler errors encountered by the script engine.
Docs.returns: Returns TRUE if the compiler is directed to continue reporting further errors to the <xref:Microsoft.Vsa.IVsaSite> object. Returns FALSE if the compiler is directed to stop reporting further errors to the object.
